Trips

table without id
	file.link as Trip,
	start as Start,
	end as End
where
	contains(category, [[Trips]]) and
	contains(loc, this.file.link)
sort file.name desc

Map

id: kyoto
minZoom: 7
maxZoom: 20
defaultZoom: 11
markerTag:
  - places
height: 400px
coordinates: [[Kyoto]]

Places

table without id
	file.link as Place,
	rating as Rating,
	type as Type
where
	contains(category, [[Places]]) and
	contains(loc, this.file.link)
sort rating desc
